value:
Shine on, Emblem of Beginnings!
...No, it's still not lighting up. Why is it
so hard to summon Emblems here?

In Elyos, we have 12 powerful beings
called Emblems. All of them make for
powerful allies—and loyal friends.

You look exhausted! Why don't you
get some sleep? I can come and wake
you up later, if you'd like.

Would you mind taking me on a
quick tour? I need to know what's
where before I can help with patrols.

I'm seeing a few familiar faces.
I'd like to say hello, but it might be
hard to explain how I know them...

I'm the Divine Dragon Alear, here
with warm ring—I mean, regards—
from $Nf.
Happy to have grown so strong!
That should help.
That wasn't much.
I can sense new power. Thank you.

I'm the Divine Dragon Alear! I will
serve you as best I... Hold on. How
did you summon me without a ring?

Now that we've become such good
friends, I find myself looking for you
when you're not around.$k$pI can't explain it, but your presence
makes me feel calmer. Maybe it's
because of our similar powers...$k$pYou have Heroes, I have Emblems,
but we're both summoners, and that
commonality binds us together.$k$pHey, can we make a promise?
Whatever happens, wherever we end
up, let's never forget each other.$k$pYou agree? Then our pact is sealed!
Now, if only we had rings, that would
really make it official...
I am the Divine Dragon!
Sleep now.
I will stop you!
Guided by the Emblems.
It's too much...
I'm glad you summoned me.
Oh! Sorry about that. I must have dozed off. Maybe I'm not quite awake yet.
Polishing rings is surprisingly relaxing. You should try it.
I'm amazed by how many Emblems—I mean Heroes—you have here.
My hair and eyes might be a little unusual, but...I like them.
Marth...my first Emblem. It feels wrong not to have you here.
Even if I can't give you an Emblem ring, I can give you a glimpse of what it feels like. Go on, say it with me: "Emblem engage!"
Yes.
I'm here.
I'll do my best.
